original_title: SLT-MOBITEL partners IntaHub to revolutionize hospitality software solutions globally
original_body_lines: SLT-MOBITEL, the National ICT Solutions Provider, partnered IntaHub (Pvt) Limited, a renowned software company that provides tailored solutions for the dynamic hospitality industry, with the aim of enhancing capabilities and pioneering cutting-edge hospitality technology on a global scale.

The collaboration was marked by a formal agreement signed by Janaka Abeysinghe, Chief Executive Officer of SLT, and Dimuth Dunusinghe, Chief Executive Officer/Chairman of IntaHub (Pvt) Limited, with representatives from both organizations present at the event.

“We are pleased to partner with Intahub as the leading telecommunications service provider in Sri Lanka. The strategic alliance symbolises our commitment to delivering advanced solutions and ensuring customer satisfaction on a global scale,” stated Janaka Abeysinghe, CEO, SLT.
The partnership between the two organisations marks a significant milestone in the telecommunications industry and has the possibility of driving positive transformation across international borders.

Dimuth Dunusinghe, CEO and Chairman of IntaHub, added, “We are excited about the endless possibilities this partnership unlocks. By joining forces, we are set to redefine excellence in hospitality software solutions, catering to the ever-growing demands of this dynamic sector.”

IntaHub is the local arm of SLT-MOBITEL, clearly focusing on providing specialised software solutions for managing and optimising operations across the hospitality sector. The company received the 2022 National Best Quality Software Award (NBQSA) in recognition of creating robust web, mobile, and Windows applications that meet industry demands.
